name: Fantasy Lovers
description: A cozy community for fantasy enthusiasts who love discussing epic worlds, magic systems, and character development.
currentBook: The Priory of the Orange Tree

name: Romance Readers
description: Swoon-worthy discussions about contemporary romance, historical romance, and everything that makes our hearts flutter.
currentBook: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo

name: Young Adult Adventures
description: Dive into the best YA fiction with fellow readers who appreciate coming-of-age stories and teen adventures.

name: LGBTQ+ Bookworms
description: Celebrating diverse voices and queer stories in literature. A safe space for discussions about representation and identity.
currentBook: The House in the Cerulean Sea

name: Dark Academia Society
description: For lovers of gothic literature, mysterious academia, and stories that blur the line between knowledge and obsession.

name: Contemporary Fiction Club
description: Exploring modern storytelling through contemporary fiction that reflects our current world and experiences.

name: Mythology & Retellings
description: Ancient stories reimagined for modern readers. Join us for discussions about mythological retellings and their timeless themes.

name: BookTok Favorites
description: Discussing the latest viral books from BookTok and social media. Stay up-to-date with trending reads and hot takes.
